name: Battle Bots
description:
Turn-Based Strategy meets Top-Down Shooting in Battle Bots !

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41 with the theme - "Combine 2 Incompatible Games".

Supporting two gameplay modes, you can play against the computer, or challenge your friend to start a battle with you ! With only two available choices each turn, observe the game board and strategically make your choice to  lead yourself to victory.

How To Play & Game Rules

Each turn you have 2 Energy points. You can move your player and shoot at any direction, however, moving and shooting uses up 1 energy point each. So, you can move once and shoot once, or move twice, or shoot twice. You can also skip your turn. Your energy is refilled every turn.

The objective of the game is to hit your opponent with a bullet !
